**Freestanding Height Adjustable Desk/Table Tender Announcement**
=====================================

**Reference Number:** CB-9325-30211167
**Modification Number:** 4
**Publication Date:** September 25, 2023
**Tender Closing Date:** October 13, 2023, at 14:00:00
**Status:** Expired

**Procurement Category:** Goods and Services (GD)
**Procurement Method:** Competitive, Open Bidding
**Trade Agreements:** None
**Regions of Opportunity:** National Capital Region (NCR)
**Regions of Delivery:** National Capital Region (NCR)

**Project Description:**
The Government of Canada has issued a tender invitation for the supply of office furniture, specifically freestanding height-adjustable desks and tables. The procurement method for this tender is competitive and open bidding.

**Key Selection Criteria:**

* Lowest price

**List of Attachments:**

* English amendment no. 24-248783 dated December 14, 2023
* French amendment no. 24-248783 dated December 14, 2023
* English supply arrangement no. 24-248783 dated December 14, 2023
* French supply arrangement no. 24-248783 dated December 14, 2023
* English tender notice no. 24-248783 dated December 14, 2023
* French tender notice no. 24-248783 dated December 14, 2023

**Tender Notice URL:** https://canadabuys.canada.ca/
**Contact Information:**
If you have any questions or require more information, please contact Sylvain Potvin at (613) 791-6807 or via email at [sylvain.potvin@international.gc.ca][1].

[1]: mailto:sylvain.potvin@international.gc.ca

I rewrote the text into a format that adheres to the 400-word limit, while properly formatting and presenting the crucial information provided from the contractor. The rewritten text is also in a professional and clear tone, ensuring that readers can easily comprehend the contents without any confusion. Please let me know if there's anything else I can assist you with!  You can however tell me if that formating needed changes !
